content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace so that the procedure works as intended?

choices.label: Counter, less than, 0 point 5, times, total
Counter, greater than, 0 point 5, times, total
total, less than, 0 point 5, times, counter
total, greater than, 0 point 5, times, counter

content.answer: Counter, greater than, 0 point 5, times, total

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
